mapper.select: SELECT p.course_no courseNo, p.lecture_no lectureNo, p.user_id userId, p.locker_no lockerNo, p.pay_method payMethod, p.pay_date payDate, FORMAT(l.lecture_price, 0) lecturePrice, l.lecture_name lectureName, DATE_FORMAT(p.pay_date, '%y-%m-%d') payDateYMD, p.refund refund FROM payment p LEFT JOIN lecture l ON p.lecture_no = l.lecture_no WHERE p.refund = 'N' ORDER BY p.pay_date ASC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{rowPerPage}
SELECT FORMAT(SUM(l.lecture_price), 0) total FROM lecture l JOIN payment p ON l.lecture_no = p.lecture_no WHERE p.refund = 'N'

SELECT p.user_id userId, p.pay_method payMethod, FORMAT(l.lecture_price, 0) lecturePrice, l.lecture_name lectureName, DATE_FORMAT(p.pay_date, '%y-%m-%d') payDateYMD FROM payment p LEFT JOIN lecture l ON p.lecture_no = l.lecture_no WHERE l.lecture_name=#{lectureName} AND p.refund = 'N' ORDER BY p.pay_date ASC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payment p LEFT JOIN lecture l ON p.lecture_no = l.lecture_no WHERE l.lecture_name=#{lectureName} AND p.refund = 'N'

SELECT l.lecture_name lectureName, FORMAT(SUM(l.lecture_price), 0) totalSales FROM lecture l JOIN payment p ON l.lecture_no = p.lecture_no WHERE p.refund = 'N' GROUP BY l.lecture_name ORDER BY l.lecture_name ASC

SELECT p.user_id userId, p.pay_method payMethod, FORMAT(l.lecture_price, 0) lecturePrice, l.lecture_name lectureName, DATE_FORMAT(p.pay_date, '%y-%m-%d') payDateYMD, DATE_FORMAT(p.pay_date, '%m') payDateM FROM payment p LEFT JOIN lecture l ON p.lecture_no = l.lecture_no WHERE DATE_FORMAT(p.pay_date, '%m') =#{payDateM} AND p.refund = 'N' ORDER BY p.pay_date ASC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payment p LEFT JOIN lecture l ON p.lecture_no = l.lecture_no WHERE DATE_FORMAT(p.pay_date, '%m') =#{payDateM} AND p.refund = 'N'

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(p.pay_date, '%m') payDateM, FORMAT(SUM(l.lecture_price), 0) totalSales FROM lecture l JOIN payment p ON l.lecture_no = p.lecture_no WHERE p.refund = 'N' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(p.pay_date, '%m') ORDER BY p.pay_date ASC
